task: Give me a concise checklist to scaffold a UI in phases.

planning.name: agent-phase-sequencing
planning.objective: define 4-6 implementation phases from discovery to polish, each with a clear deliverable and exit criteria

planning.name: agent-ui-foundations
planning.objective: produce a concise setup checklist for layout structure, component primitives, design tokens, navigation, and data/state boundaries

planning.name: agent-quality-gates
planning.objective: add per-phase validation checks for accessibility, responsiveness, performance, and release readiness

agents.name: agent-phase-sequencing
agents.objective: define 4-6 implementation phases from discovery to polish, each with a clear deliverable and exit criteria

agents.name: agent-quality-gates
agents.objective: add per-phase validation checks for accessibility, responsiveness, performance, and release readiness

agents.name: agent-ui-foundations
agents.objective: produce a concise setup checklist for layout structure, component primitives, design tokens, navigation, and data/state boundaries
